summary.span: 将 Win32 window 托管为 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 内容中的一个元素。

span.span: Hosts a Win32 window as an element within Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 到主机[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]窗口中，创建派生一个类。To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window, create a class that derives from . 重写方法，并创建你[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]作为传递给该方法的父窗口的子窗口。Override the method and create your [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window as a child of the parent window that is passed into the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 尽管派生自的各种属性，来自和其他中间类，如通常不会映射到可能[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]等效项。Although derives from , various properties of that come from and other intermediate classes such as are not generally mapped to possible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] equivalents. 而且，并非所有 / 跨互操作边界输入事件传输。Also, not all / input events transfer across the interoperation boundary. 派生自主要，以便实例可以插入到各种可能的内容模型，并因此的默认可以应用布局特征。 derives from primarily so that an instance can be inserted into the widest variety of possible content models, and so that default layout characteristics can apply. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WPF 和 Win32 互操作](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md)。For more details on , see [WPF and Win32 Interoperation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md).

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，会创建要承载的窗口。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates the window to be hosted.

span.span: The handle to the child [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window to create.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从内部的实现中调用此方法的实现。This method's implementation is called from within the internal implementation of . 仅当由调用线程所有，则将创建子窗口。The child window will be created only if the window is owned by the calling thread.

para.span: 重写此方法以生成要承载的窗口。

span.span: Override this method to build the window being hosted.

para.span: 返回窗口必须是指定的窗口的子级。

span.span: The window that you return must be a child of the window specified by .

para.span: 此外，如果由调用线程拥有该窗口将仅创建子窗口。

span.span: In addition, the child window will only be created if the window is owned by the calling thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型或成员的 Internet 安全区域中不可用。This type or member is not available in the Internet security zone. > > 可以重写此方法，但无法通过此签名。This method can be overridden, but not by this signature. 请参阅可重写的签名。See for the overridable signature. 此无参数的签名是所需的接口约定中，并且它将有效地调用活动实现，使用`disposing`正在`true`。This parameterless signature is the one required by the interface contract, and it effectively calls the active implementation with `disposing` being `true`.

summary.span: 立即释放该对象可能持有的任何系统资源。

span.span: Immediately frees any system resources that the object might hold.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型或成员的 Internet 安全区域中不可用。This type or member is not available in the Internet security zone. 派生的类可以重写此方法，如果他们需要执行其他清理操作。Derived classes can override this method if they need to do additional cleanup. 但是，它们还应调用基实现，以确保释放所有资源。However, they should also call the base implementation to ensure that all resources are freed. 基实现执行大量工作来释放资源的已知的类的基类。The base implementation does fairly substantial work to free resources that are known to the base class. 如果窗口正在承载，它将被销毁。If a window is being hosted, it will be destroyed. 调用线程必须与调度程序相同。The calling thread must be the same as the dispatcher.

The size of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型或成员的 Internet 安全区域中不可用。This type or member is not available in the Internet security zone.

permission.span: 若要调整布局 (通过让布局引擎起作用时所承载的区域)。

span.span: in order to adjust the layout (by having the layout engine act upon the hosted region).
Associated enumeration:

para.span: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]，窗口应为在创建窗口时请求布局的大小。

span.span: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)], a window is expected to be the size requested by layout at the time the window is created.

para.span: 派生的类应重写此方法，只有在具有所需的窗口大小有关的其他信息。

span.span: Derived classes should override this method only if they have additional information regarding required window size.

para.span: 此处的特定实现已重写大小约束基于窗口句柄并将一个或多个维度中的零值视为非约束的虚拟成员。

span.span: The specific implementation here is already an override of the virtual member, which bases size constraints on the window handle and treats a zero value in one or more dimensions as a non-constraint.

para.span: 类还重写如果太大，将导致窗体的剪辑的实现。

span.span: The class also overrides a implementation that will result in a clip of the form if it is too large.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型或成员的 Internet 安全区域中不可用。This type or member is not available in the Internet security zone. > > 这是类处理程序的重写，并提供转换的行为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]消息到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]事件，将事件标记为已处理在可能的情况。This is an override of the class handler and provides the behavior of translating the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] message into a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] event, marking the event as handled whenever appropriate.
